name: Periwiggle Beta
description:
If you enjoy the beta then follow us! We'll keep updating it with more features until it is a good preview of what our full game is like! Then we will focus on the content of our full game which you shall look foward to! Yarr the full game will cost ye money though, but it's worth it if ye like the beta!
